title: Total Synthesis ii Remastered For eReaders
description:
This a pdf and mobi file both are made for easy reading on eReaders. I believe the reason they are so large is because jpegs had been used in place of text. 

This Book is a good read and even a fun one. 

The original pdf you can find is very hard to read the way it is set up, I find this version completely necessary if you actually plan on reading this book.

Total Synthesis II
by Strike (Illustrator)
 
    The most comprehensive and detailed book on the underground production of ecstasy and amphetamines ever published. Step-by-step synthesis recipes with extensive detail are given for more recipes than any other book in existance. Plus, this book represents the first collaboration of the underground. Naughty chemists from around the world have contributed their favorite recipes and comments to provide the reader with massive insight and options. 

Published August 1st 1998 by Panda Ink

Here is a pic so you can get an idea of what it all means...
 
http://library-static.snapfish.com/library/share?w=snapfish_us&c=snapfish&l=en_US#_yqjKePZ3B7sDHOZx5vq5A/AUS/27938553919/SNAPFISH
